description:
We have repeatedly felt the requirement of developing interactive apps for testing and sharing our ML research. However, creating such applications was extremely difficult since we had to learn HTML, CSS, JS. Hence, we will share how to create these apps in minutes by using only Python.

Sigue a Darshita Chaturvedi: 
Sitio web: https://www.linkedin.com/in/darshitac/

Sigue a PyLatam en:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PyLatam
Sitio oficial: https://pylatam.org/
title: Creating a testing workbench for ML teams using just Python
